cast.overview: Prominent gang leader Cyrus calls a meeting of New York's gangs to set aside their turf wars and take over the city. At the meeting, a rival leader kills Cyrus, but a Coney Island gang called the Warriors is wrongly blamed for Cyrus' death. Before you know it, the cops and every gangbanger in town is hot on the Warriors' trail.
cast.title: The Warriors

crew.original_title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
crew.overview: After years of war, the Federation and the Klingon empire find themselves on the brink of a peace summit when a Klingon ship is nearly destroyed by an apparent attack from the Enterprise. Both worlds brace for what may be their deadliest encounter.
crew.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country

crew.overview: A team of elite commandos on a secret mission in a Central American jungle come to find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.
crew.title: Predator

crew.overview: Construction worker Douglas Quaid's obsession with the planet Mars leads him to visit Recall, a company that manufactures memories. When his memory implant goes wrong, Doug can no longer be sure what is and isn't reality.
crew.title: Total Recall

crew.overview: In this captivating Depression-era melodrama, impetuous veterinary student Jacob Jankowski joins a celebrated circus as an animal caretaker but faces a wrenching dilemma when he's transfixed by angelic married performer Marlena.
crew.title: Water for Elephants

details.biography: Gary Dana Baxley (Born December 31th, 1950) is an American Stuntman and actor. He made his debut in 1974 in the tv series Kolchak: The Night Stalker and since gone to work on 131 high profile tv shows and movies as a Stuntman including The Dukes of Hazzard, Predator,  See No Evil, Hear No Evil, Total Recall (1990), Universal Solider, Hoffa, Star Trek, Amazing Spider-Man 2 and Jurassic World. He played one of the punks in Walter Hill's Cult Classic The Warriors. He is the cousin of Stuntman and Director Craig Baxley.
details.name: Gary Baxley
